metadata.title: CVE-2024-7701 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Use of Password Hash With Insufficient Computational Effort vulnerabilityin percona percona-toolkit allows Encryption Brute Forcing.This issueaffects percona-toolkit: 3.6.0.

criterions.comment: percona-toolkit package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
